mapper.insert: insert into agents (id, agent_code, name, card_id, types, company_name, business_license, phone, email, customer_id, address, form_types, parent_id, status, is_have_profit, created_at, updated_at, code ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agentCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{types,jdbcType=BIT}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formTypes,jdbcType=BIT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isHaveProfit,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update agents set agent_code = #{agentCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, types = #{types,jdbcType=BIT}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_license = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_types = #{formTypes,jdbcType=BIT}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_have_profit = #{isHaveProfit,jdbcType=BIT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, agent_code, name, card_id, types, company_name, business_license, phone, email, customer_id, address, form_types, parent_id, status, is_have_profit, created_at, updated_at, code from agents where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, agent_code, name, card_id, types, company_name, business_license, phone, email, customer_id, address, form_types, parent_id, status, is_have_profit, created_at, updated_at, code from agents
